extendedInfo.description: Swimmers Beware! Hungry Sharkâ¢ is back and hungrier than ever! Experience life as a Shark in the ultimate test of survival. Jaw dropping 3D graphics and action packed gameplay. Grow from a pup into a 10 ton Great White Shark! Eat your way around a diverse aquatic world full of wonder and danger. Feast on tasty sea creatures, swimmers, turtles and fishermen to grow into a giant. Battle enemy sharks, submarines, and the weird creatures of the deep. Chain up combo bonuses to gain massive hiscores! Complete missions and find treasure to earn coins and gems. Spend these rewards on upgrading your sharks abilities or buy special life-saving items. Progress to unlock the most ferocious beasts in the sea: Mako Shark, Hammerhead, Tiger Shark and the almighty Great White Features: â Console quality 3D graphics â 5 Shark species to grow & upgrade â Unlock Baby Sharks & other awesome extras! â A huge free-roaming world to terrorise â Intuitive touch or tilt controls â Sunken treasure to discover â Many weird & wonderful creatures to eat â 45 missions to complete â A clockwork robot gibbon â Facebook social features â Google Play Games achievements & hi-scores leaderboardsâ Regular updates on the way - new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game, but leveling up is easy, but I think could be better, I also think That buying sharks when you are a level 10, souldnt cost so much. Otherwise, amazing game
reviews.author: Matthew Ambrose

reviews.comment: Fantastic game. One of the best, this is a no brained unless your scared of sharks.\tDownload and enjoy
reviews.author: Mervyn A

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: My new favorite. The graphics is just amazing! This game is just so fun and addictive. Loving it!!
reviews.author: Shakur Reajat

reviews.title: Super fun! Don\'t miss out.
reviews.comment: Great game. Nice visuals, fun game play, good controls, not freemium... What more could you want?
reviews.author: Annoy E. Mouse

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Really great game, good graphics and sound. Missions are fun. Only down side is it uses a lot af battery power maybe an update would fix this. Then it would definitely be a 5 Star Game.
reviews.author: Thomas Lavery

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good controls , entertaining, fun to play, all around a badass game
reviews.author: Shaun Riley

reviews.title: Dude this game is the most fantastic and great
reviews.comment: Dude this game is the most fantastic and greatest game of the world I think so
reviews.author: aser gucci

reviews.title: Cooooooool
reviews.comment: This game is very exciting I would give it much stars if I could. Coooooooooooool Samsung galaxy s advance
reviews.author: Islam Abohadia

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: It cool icfound the great white shark
reviews.author: Roman Asidera

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: Great graphics., great sound.! Fun missions. overfull fun
reviews.author: Toree Hardy

reviews.title: Pricey much?? And storage!!
reviews.comment: After all that hard work you make us pay for the next shark we should pay in COINS if we havent leveled up!! And come on 90k just for a laser! And what with 88 mb I mean come on 5 mins wasted!
reviews.author: Adnaan Patel

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: This is now the third update I\'ve done and I still don\'t have my sharks or gems. I\'ll try e-mailing the makers. If I don\'t get my stuff back I\'m uninstalling which sucks cause this was one of my favorite games.
reviews.author: Samantha Zieglowsky

reviews.title: Lost over $75 on update
reviews.comment: I bought paid for the methadone shark a few weeks later it\'s no longer in game and all others I bought have to be paid for again wtf?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Star
reviews.comment: I don\'t usually rate apps until I\'m amazed or fascinated with the way its made. I started using this app two weeks ago and I have been giving it some play time and I must say its awesome.. If you want a free app this is a grate app for both old and young. You are going spend more time playing this then candy crush trust me. Grate app good for Nexus 7 old and new runs with no hip ups smooth game play.
reviews.author: mohsin Begg

reviews.title: Needs fixing
reviews.comment: This was the first game I EVER downloaded and it kept freezing so much i had to take my battery out and uninstall it. Not pleased at all.
reviews.author: Ricky Rude

reviews.title: Dis game should be discontinued all it does is infect ur phone
reviews.comment: All this app dis was make my phone crash and keep crashin till i manage to uninstall it
reviews.author: Mrk Cerda

reviews.title: Virtual d pad ( touch control )
reviews.comment: Please fix bug when ever I want to boost it goes to were I am touching even though I am touching it on the corner of my screen
reviews.author: anthony cabrera

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Simply the greatest game ever!!! Graphics are awesome and sharks are so cool!!! So addictive but so worth it!!!
reviews.author: anna ani

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love it and it is cool
reviews.author: salamatu kamara

reviews.title: Game doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It sucks I redownloaded the game 3 times and it crashes every time. Please fix I have a Samsung Galaxy S4.
